title: Pigeon and veal pie
ingredients: ['salt and pepper, to taste', '2 tablespoons plain flour', '400g pigeon meat, diced', '200g veal, diced', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '110g streaky bacon, diced', '1 onion, chopped', '85g mushrooms, chopped', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '4 tablespoons chicken stock', '50ml single cream', '55g chopped fresh parsley', '1 sheet shortcrust pastry', '1 egg, lightly beaten']
